releaseNotes: Presence bug fixes.Added LEDVANCE, Reduces log traffic, Better chron setup

drivers.name: Zigbee Sonoff - generic relays
drivers.description: Works with Sonoff MINI ZB,eWeLink,3A Smart Home and other generic zigbee relays. And generic outlets. Presence,Lamp_01,SA-003-Zigbee,01MINIZB,BASICZBR3,LXN59-1S7LX1.0, Sylvania SMART + LEDVANCE
